thoughts: Is sad {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} never got {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} to be a real officer
Imagines what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} owsla life would have been like
Practices {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} battle moves in the sunny fields
Is glad that elders don't need guarding in Inlé
Wonders if the water ever freezes in Inlé
Sneaks close to the border of the lightless lands but dares not go in
Runs through Inlé's meadows with r_r
Encourages r_r to dip {PRONOUN/r_r/poss} paws into the cool water
